WorkItem.Description: Loaded my enhance shaman to optimize gems/enchants, when I went to optimize I got an error saying no legs were available, and then saying that my equipped legs were equipped but not available. As it was loaded from b.net, as well as testing by deselecting and reselecting the pants, and the green diamond was there, it should've been available.
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Available legs not seen by optimizer

Comments.Message: Was able to reproduce.  The only thing that I can see that might be causing this is that your legs are leather (which I haven't marked as a relevant item type).
Well damn, I must've been dead exhausted when I bought those. Thanks for the response.
Going to close this.  If this occurs again with a mail item or an otherwise appropriate piece (neck, ring, etc), please re-open.
